Module kivakit.collections

Package com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher

package com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    CollectionChangeListener<T>
    Interface that listens to changes to a collection of objects.
    CollectionChangeWatcher<T>
    An interface to an object that watches changes to a collection
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T>
    A base implementation of CollectionChangeWatcher.
    PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher<T>
    A CollectionChangeWatcher that checks for changes at a given Frequency.
